attributes.action: Ban the grand national and make horse racing and fox hunting illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Horses cannot say no to being forced to race, they cannot say if they are tired. Foxes cannot defend themselves against a pack of dogs and people on horses.

The money people make should not come above the health and safety of these beautiful creatures.

End this cruel sport now
attributes.background:
Ban the grand national and make horse racing and fox hunting known for what it truly is... animal cruelty.
Anyone injuring a pet or farm animal in this way would be sent to court for animal cruelty. This has to stop.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions about banning horse racing and protecting foxes, which you might like to sign.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245063

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245865

You might also like to sign this petition about animal welfare in horse racing and the Grand National:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256133
